config.prettybeaches.title: Pretty Beaches
config.prettybeaches.affectedBlocks.tool: List of blocks that should be affected by the adjusted water physics. If you want to have all blocks affected, just include "*" in the list.
config.prettybeaches.infiniteBucketWater: Whether buckets should be able to retrieve infinite water without destroying sources as well.
config.prettybeaches.animatedFlooding.to: Whether the flooding of adjacent air blocks should be animated or instant.
